author: Scott Engle
title: FAMILY OF CHILD KILLED IN FRIDAY DWI CRASH NEEDS HELP
text:
Normally, MCPR does not post GOFUNDME due to the amount of fraud we have found. But there are exceptions, especially when a scene is so bad that I know it is not someone trying to gain. Last Friday night, Joana Tores took her three children, Luis , age 8, Yadiel , age 15, and Addiel , age 12, to the McDonald’s on SH 242 near the HEB. As the kids left there with their Happy Meals, Ms. Tores turned onto SH 242 to head east. It was then that the intoxicated driver in a Toyota Tundra, traveling at a high rate of speed, slammed into the rear of the Tahoe, crushing it. Yadiel was in the front seat and suffered minor injuries.. Luis was in the third seat and was critically injured. Addiel was in the middle seat. He was also critically injured, with severe head trauma. MCHD transported the four to Memorial Hermann in The Woodlands. Addiel was then flown to Memorial Hermann in Houston, where he passed away on Sunday. The Tundra driver had no insurance. Ms. Tores had only liability insurance. Just to see the scene with McDonald’s Happy Meals scattered throughout is nerve-racking and very upsetting, knowing an intoxicated driver had caused the end of a Happy Day. DPS investigated the crash. Intoxication Manslaughter and Intoxication Assault charges are expected. Please keep the family in your prayers.
GOFUNDME-CLICK HERE -PLEASE HELP

author: world today us
title: Montgomery County School Board Director Faces Calls to Resign Over Controversial Comments About VP Kamala Harris
text:
Montgomery County School Board Director Faces Mounting Pressure to Resign Contentious Social Media Post Ignites Outcry In Montgomery County, a local school board director is under increasing scrutiny following a controversial social media post allegedly directed at Vice President Kamala Harris. The uproar transitioned from online forums to the physical arena of the Souderton Area School District’s regular board meeting held on Wednesday evening.
Details of the Controversy Reports indicate that back in late July, School Board Director William Formica made a lewd comment about Vice President Harris on social media, which he later deleted. However, the damage was done as screen captures of his post circulated widely across various platforms.
School Board Meeting Escalates Tensions During Wednesday night’s board meeting, Formica was absent, and the agenda did not openly address the issue of his comments. Frustration erupted from the audience, leading to booing and members of the audience exiting the venue in protest.
Community Reactions and Calls for Accountability Local residents have voiced their concerns passionately. Corinne Degeiso, a representative of the Souderton Area for Responsible Leadership, emphasized her dismay, addressing the implications of Formica’s comments on young girls stating, “I have a daughter. I don’t want her to grow up thinking that men like this are correct and she would only get to places of power—not through hard work, but through other means.”
School Board’s Response The school board responded with a statement condemning Formica’s choice of language as inappropriate, indicating that they need “some time to process this situation.” A petition demanding his resignation has gained momentum on Change.org, amassing over 1,800 signatures, though opinions on his resignation are divided.
Supporters Defend His Tenure Despite the backlash, some community members argue that Formica’s contributions to the school board warrant his retention. “He does a lot of financial management for the district. He’s very skilled in that,” mentioned Kaitlin Destine, representing the Valley Conservative Voice. Supporters point out his advocacy for parental rights and child welfare policies, noting that these positions haven’t changed amid the controversy.
Upcoming Actions The controversy surrounding Formica is set to continue as an action meeting is scheduled for August 29, with a number of parents poised to renew their calls for his resignation. NBC10 has reached out to Formica for a statement regarding his potential attendance at the upcoming meeting but has yet to receive a response.

author: AB Newswire
title: Intense Supernatural Thriller “Torment: Descension” by Daniel Foster Unleashes a Gripping Tale of Faith, Morality, and the Unseen Forces | User | mammothtimes.com
text:
Daniel Foster, an acclaimed author unveils a gripping supernatural thriller in his latest release, "Torment: Descension." David and Grace, blissful new parents, face a terrifying ordeal when their infant son falls gravely ill. Foster's narrative explores the profound question: How far would one go to save their family?
"Torment: Descension" thrusts readers into a classic battle of good versus evil, following David's harrowing journey as he confronts moral dilemmas to rescue his child. The story probes the resilience of faith amidst adversity, forcing David to navigate a world where every choice carries profound consequences.
Foster's storytelling skills and suspenseful plot, challenge readers with universal themes of morality and spirituality. Should David's faith be strongest in times of need? Or can a momentary lapse lead to the worst decision of his life? Foster poses questions that resonate with the masses, creating a thought-provoking narrative that makes its own special place in the readers’ minds.
"Torment: Descension" is now available on Amazon.
